channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- GroupMe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- GroupMe

item.title: CVE-2024-38183|2024-09-19T17:09:58.986Z -- microsoft -- groupme
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in GroupMe allows an a unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network by convincing a user to click on a malicious link.

item.title: CVE-2024-38164|2024-09-19T17:37:06.188Z -- microsoft -- groupme
